examples.description: Examines consumer-grade EEG headsets for practical drowsiness detection systems.
examples.note: Added for its focus on the practical application and usability of consumer-grade EEG headsets in real-world drowsiness detection systems.

examples.description: Develops a pBCI system for classifying drowsy and alert states using only a single EEG channel, enhancing practicality.
examples.note: Added for its contribution to practical, non-intrusive EEG-based fatigue detection systems with a focus on simplified hardware requirements.
